EmailTemplate.description: Used to send the initial survey after qualification (Nov. 2017)
EmailTemplate.name: ISV Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: 10K ISV Enablement Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in working with 10K! As we discussed, we're evaluating a select few ISV partners who are interested in building a community of advocates and implementation experts for their products.
Please use this link: https://www.getfeedback.com/r/rrIxwznN?AccountName={!Account.Name} to take a survey that is your first step in the process.
Once the survey is complete, we will continue your onboarding by:
Collecting and reviewing your existing product documentation Coordinating a demo of your app Reviewing your implementation methodology in more detail
We are excited to be working with you! Please let us know if you have any questions.
10K ISV Enablement
